channel.title: Recruiting!
channel.description:
We are currently recruiting coders etc... <!------current positions needed------!> Quest Dev. Area Dev. Full coder RPG coder -- Pbrain30 (me) RPG quest writer RPG story writer -- Eternity RPG Character Drawer RPG character Personality writer RPG monster drawer (may fall in with character drawing) RPG Title artist and Game Over artist's
Ty ~futursoft Developments The link to the forums if you wanna apply is in my sig if it is not [url=http://www.alternativeworlds.net/smf/]CLICK HERE[/url] [br][size=1]Posted on: February 24, 2007, 04:58:29 PM[/size][hr]~bump~ now adding the rights to them players with the status of: [b]Quest writer[/b] - can - remove move or lock posts that are in their topic (they get their own topic) [b]Character Drawer[/b] - can - remove move or lock posts that are in their topic (they get their own topic) [b]character Personality writer[/b] - can - remove move or lock posts that are in their topic (they get their own topic) [b]monster drawer[/b] - can - remove move or lock posts that are in their topic (they get their own topic) [b]artist[/b] - can - remove move or lock posts that are in their topic (they get their own topic) [b]they can all[/b] - warn people not in their right status for posting in their topic ZOMG its only visual warning no bans if someone gets bannd report to me and i will look into it
